title: Severe storms to batter East Coast from Georgia to New York
description: Live coverage and updates of storms and severe weather expected in the East and South.

title: Trump lawyers seek to narrow special counsel's proposed protective order in election case
description: Federal prosecutors had asked Judge Tanya Chutkan for an order barring Trump and his lawyers from sharing discovery materials with unauthorized people in the election case.

title: Another week of heat ahead for millions across the U.S.
description: About 70 million people remained under heat alerts Monday afternoon following a record-breaking weekend of warmth across much of the U.S.

title: Judge tosses Trump's counterclaim against E. Jean Carroll, finding rape claim 'substantially true'
description: A federal judge dismissed Donald Trump's countersuit against E. Jean Carroll, finding her continued claim of rape "substantially true."

title: William Friedkin, director of 'The Exorcist' and 'The French Connection,' dies at 87
description: William Friedkin, the film director behind “The French Connection” and “The Exorcist," has died.

title: How U.S. microchips are fueling Russia’s military — despite sanctions
description: Western microchips used to power smartphones and laptops are continuing to enter Russia and fuel its military arsenal, new analysis shows.

title: Oregon man accused of holding woman captive in makeshift cell appeared on 'Judge Judy' with children's mother
description: A man who officials say kidnapped and held a woman captive in a makeshift cell in his Oregon garage appeared in a 2018 episode of "Judge Judy" with the mother of his two children.

title: Casey DeSantis opens up about her battle with breast cancer
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis and his wife, Casey DeSantis, opened up about her battle with cancer in an exclusive interview with NBC News.

title: PayPal launches first dollar-backed stablecoin from a major U.S. financial institution
description: PayPal on Monday launched a U.S. dollar-backed stablecoin to help facilitate payments as its latest addition to its suite of crypto services.

title: Nursing pillows have been involved in more than 160 infant deaths, NBC News investigation finds
description: Nursing pillows help new moms breastfeed, but an NBC News investigation found that dozens of babies have died in incidents involving the horseshoe-shaped cushions.

title: Ukraine says Russian informant detained in Zelenskyy assassination plot
description: KYIV — Ukraine said Monday it had detained an informant who was sharing intelligence with Russia as part of a plot to assassinate President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

title: 'Barbie' joins billion-dollar club and summer heat endangers warehouse workers: Morning Rundown
description: DeSantis interview, Alabama brawl, Barbie ticket sales, Angus Cloud, Elon Musk cage fight, Emily Drabinski

title: The new liberal majority on the Wisconsin Supreme Court is off to a tense start
description: The Wisconsin Supreme Court's new liberal majority is likely to face cases on abortion and other partisan issues as tension with conservatives grows.

title: Top librarian calls 'Marxist lesbian' tweet backlash 'regrettable'
description: Right-wing activists have asserted that librarians following the American Library Association's lead have been captured by a “woke” ideology.

title: Trucking giant Yellow declares bankruptcy after years of financial struggles
description: Trucking company Yellow Corp. has declared bankruptcy after years of financial struggles and growing debt, marking a significant shift for the U.S. transportation industry and shippers nationwide.

title: 'Of course he lost': Ron DeSantis rejects Trump's 2020 election claims
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis on Sunday rejected Donald Trump's claim that he was the true winner of the 2020 presidential election in his most forceful comments to date on the matter.

title: At least 3 dead after bus carrying dozens and vehicle collide on Pennsylvania interstate
description: At least three people were killed and others injured after a bus carrying as many as 50 people and a passenger vehicle crashed on a Pennsylvania freeway late Sunday night, authorities said.
